workspace.name: SenpaiJepang MVP 1.0 Delivery
workspace.description:
Trust-first MVP execution board (Web + Dashboard first).
Policy: Quality > Quantity.

cards.name: [S0] Setup monorepo and baseline app scaffolds
cards.desc:
Create repo structure for api/web-sdm/dashboard/admin and shared packages.
Acceptance: workspace builds on CI and local dev bootstrap is documented.

cards.name: [S0] Implement CI quality gates
cards.desc:
Add lint, typecheck, unit tests, SAST, secret scanning.
Acceptance: PR cannot merge when checks fail.

cards.name: [S0] Auth service skeleton + RBAC foundations
cards.desc: Implement auth module skeleton with role model and session strategy.

cards.name: [S0] Observability baseline
cards.desc: Enable structured logs, tracing and API latency metrics.
checklist: Create alert for API error spike

cards.name: [S0] Trust policy and consent copy v1
cards.desc: Finalize legal-safe wording for verification, critical consent and platform scope.

cards.name: [S1] User registration/login flow
cards.desc: Build register/login/refresh/logout endpoints and web forms.

cards.name: [S1] KYC session lifecycle API
cards.desc: Implement create session, upload metadata, submit KYC, status endpoint.

cards.name: [S1] KYC provider adapter v1
cards.desc: Build provider adapter abstraction and webhook handler with idempotency.

cards.name: [S1] Manual review queue v1 (Admin)
cards.desc: Admin can review pending KYC and set approve/reject outcome.

cards.name: [S1] Critical consent UI + consent ledger
cards.desc: Interactive agreement flow with versioned consent records.

cards.name: [S2] Organization profile and team roles
cards.desc: TSK/LPK organization onboarding and member management.

cards.name: [S2] TSK registry sync worker
cards.desc: Scheduled ingestion job for official TSK registry snapshot.

cards.name: [S2] Organization verification engine
cards.desc: Match org registration to snapshot and output status with reason codes.

cards.name: [S2] Dashboard baseline (TSK/LPK)
cards.desc: Create dashboard shell with nav, verification tab and status widgets.

cards.name: [S2] Mismatch resolution SOP and templates
cards.desc: Ops playbook for resolving not-found/mismatch cases.

cards.name: [S3] Job posting lifecycle API
cards.desc: Create job CRUD with publish/close lifecycle for verified orgs only.

cards.name: [S3] SDM mobile-web job discovery
cards.desc: Responsive job list/detail with filter by sector and prefecture.

cards.name: [S3] Application flow + trust gates
cards.desc: Candidate can apply only if KYC verified and not blacklisted.

cards.name: [S3] Application management in dashboard
cards.desc: TSK sees applicants and can shortlist/reject with notes.

cards.name: [S3] Notification pipeline v1
cards.desc: Send transactional notifications for KYC and application status changes.

cards.name: [S4] Fraud report submission flow
cards.desc: Allow users to create fraud reports with evidence attachments.

cards.name: [S4] Case ticket engine + SLA
cards.desc: Auto-create case tickets and monitor SLA with escalation.

cards.name: [S4] Blacklist enforcement
cards.desc: Block interactions for blacklisted entities on critical actions.

cards.name: [S4] Trust profile API with reason codes
cards.desc: Expose explainable trust factors to avoid opaque trust score behavior.

cards.name: [S4] Ops dashboard for case backlog
cards.desc: Admin panel for backlog, aging bucket, and SLA breach visibility.

cards.name: [S5] Load and performance testing
cards.desc: Run load tests for auth, KYC status, job search, apply, and case APIs.

cards.name: [S5] Security hardening and abuse protection
cards.desc: Apply security controls and validate baseline defenses.

cards.name: [S5] Backup-restore and DR rehearsal
cards.desc: Validate recovery objectives and backup integrity.

cards.name: [S5] UAT pilot run with selected partners
cards.desc: Run end-to-end pilot with limited TSK/LPK and collect gap list.

cards.name: [S5] Go/No-Go review and launch checklist
cards.desc: Final launch gate based on trust, reliability, and compliance criteria.
checklist: Approve launch or trigger reliability sprint
